dcterms:description: A platform for studying the sample efficiency of different algorithms for instruction following tasks in a gridworld environment, where an agent is given tasks in natural language to accomplish.
dcterms:title: BabyAI

dcterms:description: Demonstrations generated within the BabyAI platform by a heuristic expert, used to inform the training curriculum for the agent.
dcterms:title: Demos from BabyAI's heuristic expert

dcterms:description: A set of 1000 demonstrations used in the experiments to evaluate the proposed algorithm.
dcterms:title: Demonstrations used in the experiments
